text.0:
Claims that the inventor of PCR said his test wasn’t designed to detect infectious diseases are totally wrong. 

This is a misunderstanding of his comments about the limitations of the process in determining the levels of a virus in a sample.

https://t.co/oBHN8KYzUS
text.1:
We were asked about a video in which Dominic Raab appears to say that Covid tests have a 93% false positive rate.

Mr Raab has been taken out of context. He was referring to a report on the benefits of testing at airports, which is about false negatives.

https://t.co/8ds0oxqAd0
